video_prompt: Tree's white bark peels. Delicate white flowers and pink buds emerge, drifting and gently blurring. Orange peel-like elements curve and intertwine, glowing with inner light. Mist rolls along mossy ground. Bright specks drift and sparkle in the air. Fuchsia pink berries sway. Sky transitions subtly from blue to warm.
image_prompt: **Vibrant digital art: Whimsical forest scene at sunrise/sunset. White birch tree with floating, glowing white cherry blossoms and prominent yellow stamens. Graceful, glowing orange peel ribbons intertwining through the air. Lush green mossy ground with ethereal mist and sparkling dust motes. Fuchsia pink berries in upper right. Clear azure sky transitioning to warm light. Dreamy, magical, tranquil atmosphere.**
refined_video_prompt: Bark peels, revealing white beneath. White flowers and pink buds emerge delicately, then drift and blur. Orange peel-like elements curve, intertwine, and glow internally. Mist rolls across mossy ground. Bright specks drift, sparkling through the air. Fuchsia pink berries sway. Sky subtly shifts from blue to warm.
